channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For retail investors, the S&P 500’s correction shows how risk tolerance matters
Apple now faces a problem far bigger than tariffs or weak iPhone sales
The leader of a major government union outlines their strategy to battle Trump federal cuts—And says Elon Musk has ‘no clue’ about workers
item.description: AFSCME president Lee Saunders says that unions must organize, mobilize, and educate in this crucial moment.

item.title: Can Leapmotor save Stellantis in the shift to electric vehicles?
item.description: Could Leapmotor be the Stellantis marque that turns the multinational behemoth’s fortunes around?

item.title: Trump guts staff at Voice of America and other pro-democracy, US-funded media organizations
item.description: The Agency for Global Media also sent notices terminating grants to Radio Free Asia and other programming run by the agency.

item.title: Federal workers’ struggles to get jobless benefits may be red flag for economy
Readers ask: Who can help me with Social Security problems amid all the cuts?
DOGE is flirting with the ‘third rail’ of American politics — errors could delay or disrupt benefits, a former top Social Security official says
item.description: The White House says that it won’t mess with Social Security, Medicare, or Medicaid benefits, but the loss of expertise raises concerns.

item.title: Why you shouldn't do anything about your 401(k) until this Tuesday
Trump claims tariffs will make the U.S. ‘rich again.’ But 5 undisputed facts about how they work throw cold water on that notion
item.description: What we know so far: Tariffs will have a huge effect on the economy—just not the one the President is projecting.
